Trade: Every level of this skill reduces your trade penalty by 5%%. (Party skill)
Každá úroveň této dovednosti zvyšuje maximální počet jednotek, které můžeš vést o 5 a snižuje jejich žold. (Schopnost velitele)
Každá úroveň této schopnosti zvyšuje maximální počet vězňů o %d. (Schopnost velitele)
This skill helps you make other people accept your point of view. It also lowers the minimum level of relationship needed to get NPCs to do what you want. (Personal skill)
This skill allows you to construct siege equipment and fief improvements more efficiently. (Party skill)
Heroes regain 5%% per skill level of hit-points lost during mission. (Party skill)
Each point of this skill gives a 4%% chance that a mortally struck party member will be wounded rather than killed. (Party skill)
Party healing speed is increased by 20%% per level of this skill. Additionally, each point increases the chance that deep wounds will heal better by 5%%. (Party skill)
Increases inventory capacity by +6 per skill level. (Leader skill)
Party seeing range is increased by 10%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Party map speed is increased by 3%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Every two levels of this skill increases starting battle advantage by 1. (Party skill)
Every day, each hero with this skill adds some experience to every other member of the party whose level is lower than his/hers. Experience gained goes as: {0,4,10,16,23,30}. (Personal skill)
This skill increases the amount of loot obtained by 10%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Zvyšuje poškození a přesnost lukostřelby a vrhacích zbraní při jízdě na koni. (Osobní schopnost)

Enables you to ride horses of higher difficulty levels and increases your riding speed and manuever. With a skill of 4 or higher, you can also call your horse with the 'H' key in a battle. (Personal skill)
Reduces damage to shields (by 8%% per skill level) and improves shield speed and coverage. (Personal skill)
Makes it easier to learn weapon proficiencies, increases the proficiency limits and improves shield speed and coverage. Limits go as: 60, 100, 140, 180, 220, 260, 300, 340, 380, 420. (Personal skill)
Adequate maintenance of your equipment will lower the chance of it breaking in battle. Each point of this skill reduces the probability of breaking by 7%%. (Party skill)
Lets character use more powerful bows. Each point to this skill (up to four plus power-draw requirement of the bow) increases bow damage by 14%%. (Personal skill)
Each point to this skill increases throwing damage by 10%%. (Personal skill)
Each point to this skill increases melee damage by 8%%. (Personal skill)
Each point to this skill increases hit points by +2. (Personal skill)
Party map speed on sea is increased by 5%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Every point increases the maximum number of ships you can command. (Leader skill)
